content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_bed
inventory=[{"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 20}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}]

thought: I need to craft a magenta_bed which requires crafting magenta_dye. The only way to do so without other materials is to use the allium in slot 32, which needs to be placed in the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_bed
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "allium", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 20}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that the magenta_dye is crafted, I need to move it into a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_bed
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 20}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a magenta bed, I need to place the magenta dye at slot 11 into the crafting grid, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_bed
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 20}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}]
thought: The magenta dye is already in the crafting grid, so I will move the white bed at slot 31 to the right of the dye in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_bed
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "blue_banner", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 61, "index": 20}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 50, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_fence", "quantity": 9, "index": 34}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}]
thought: I have crafted the magenta bed, so I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
